OrgName: Soft Computer Consultants, Inc. d/b/a SCC Soft Computer
PPLoc: http://www.softcomputer.com/about-scc/privacy/ as well as in the internal company handbook that each employee accesses. In addition, annual training on the privacy policy statement is held.
activities: SCC Soft Computer is a Medical Device Software company regulated by the US FDA, developing and supporting products for hospital Laboratory Information Systems. Clients sign a Business Associate’s agreement with SCC due to the fact that SCC must occasionally access patient data while supporting or fixing a problem with the software. SCC developed a required training course in HIPAA privacy that all employees must attend. Since SCC is regulated by the FDA, the FDA has reviewed the privacy statements of the company as well. In addition, the company policies and procedure manual details what to do if protected information is received from a client.
industrysector: Computer Software - (CSF)Health Care Services - (HCS)Computer Services - (CSV)Information Services - (INF)
personaldata: The data includes manually processed data.
privacyprograms: CLIA88, Joint Commission on Accreditation of Healthcare Organizations (JCAHO), College of American Pathologists (CAP), Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA), and American Association of Blood Banks (AABB)
recoursemech:
Compliance with legal and regulatory authorities (state and federal courts-US FDA) that provide for handling of individual complaints and dispute resolutions.

Also complies with EU DPAs.
